00002 import wx.lib.plot as plot
00003 
00004 class IndividualPanel(plot.PlotCanvas):
00005     def __init__(self, parent, id, data, data_max):
00006         plot.PlotCanvas.__init__(self, parent = parent)#, size=(400,400))
00007 
00008         self.parent = parent
00009 
00010         self.id = id
00011 
00012         problem_size = data_max
00013         target = [(0,0), (data_max,data_max)]
00014         candidate = [(0,0), (data_max, data)]
00015 
00016         target_line = plot.PolyLine(target, legend='Target', colour='green', width=3)
00017         candidate_line = plot.PolyLine(candidate, legend='Candidate', colour='red', width=3)
00018         gc = plot.PlotGraphics([target_line, candidate_line], '', '', '')
00019         self.Draw(gc, xAxis= (0,problem_size), yAxis= (0,problem_size))
00020 
00021         self.SetEnableLegend(True)
00022         self.SetGridColour('black')
00023 
00024         self.Bind(wx.EVT_LEFT_DOWN, self._bestSelect, self)
00025         self.Bind(wx.EVT_RIGHT_DOWN, self._worstSelect, self)
00026 
00027         self.Bind(wx.EVT_LEFT_DCLICK, parent.onBestSelect, self)
00028         self.Bind(wx.EVT_RIGHT_DCLICK, parent.onWorstSelect, self)

00031     def OnMouseLeftDown(self,event):
00032         self.parent.onBestSelect(self.id)
00033 
00034 #------------------------------------------#
00035     def OnMouseRightDown(self,event):
00036         self.parent.onWorstSelect(self.id)

00039     def getID(self):

00042 #------------------------------------------#

00045         self.worstLabel.Hide()

00048     def _bestSelect(self,event):
00049         print 'best selected ', self.id
00050 
00051 #------------------------------------------#
00052     def _worstSelect(self,event):
00053         print 'worst selected ', self.id

00055 #------------------------------------------#
00056     def bestSelect(self):
00057         print 'best selected ', self.id
00058         self.bestLabel.Show()
00059         self.worstLabel.Hide()
00060         self.Layout()
00061 
00062 #------------------------------------------#
00063     def worstSelect(self):
00064         print 'worst selected ', self.id
00065         self.bestLabel.Hide()
00066         self.worstLabel.Show()
